model.name: RCRCGDPF
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW RCRCGDPF ( ORIGIN string(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'ORIGIN', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2ALNB INTEGER NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2ALNB', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2B9NB INTEGER NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2B9NB', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2ACDT INTEGER NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2ACDT', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2QGCH STRING(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2QGCH', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2KERC BIGDECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2KERC', NATIVE_TYPE 'BIGDECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2PESO BIGDECIMAL(8,3) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2PESO', NATIVE_TYPE 'BIGDECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2BAQT INTEGER NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2BAQT', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2A1TX string(25) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2A1TX', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2NIF string(17) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2NIF', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2AUTX string(70) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2AUTX', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2ENTX string(40) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2ENTX', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2DGAL string(15) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2DGAL', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), EQKJNB INTEGER NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'EQKJNB', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), EQA6ST STRING(1) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'EQA6ST', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), EQASVN string(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'EQASVN', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), EQFRNB INTEGER NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'EQFRNB', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), GJA5NB string(9) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'GJA5NB', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), GJKGCD string(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'GJKGCD', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), CONSTRAINT PK_RCRCGDPF PRIMARY KEY(E2ALNB) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'RCRCGDPF',UPDATABLE 'true') AS SELECT RCRCGDPF.ORIGIN, RCRCGDPF.E2ALNB, RCRCGDPF.E2B9NB, RCRCGDPF.E2ACDT, RCRCGDPF.E2QGCH, RCRCGDPF.E2KERC, RCRCGDPF.E2PESO, RCRCGDPF.E2BAQT, RCRCGDPF.E2A1TX, RCRCGDPF.E2NIF, RCRCGDPF.E2AUTX, RCRCGDPF.E2ENTX, RCRCGDPF.E2DGAL, RCRCSTPF.EQKJNB, RCRCSTPF.EQA6ST, RCRCSTPF.EQASVN, RCRCSTPF.EQFRNB, RCPRORPF.GJKGCD, RCPRORPF.GJA5NB FROM MOD_RCRCGDPF.RCRCGDPF, MOD_RCPRORPF.RCPRORPF, MOD_RCRCSTPF.RCRCSTPF WHERE E2ALNB = GJALNB AND E2B9NB = GJB9NB AND E2ACDT = GJACDT AND GJB9NB = EQB9NB AND GJALNB = EQALNB AND GJACDT = EQACDT;

model.name: MOD_RCRCGDPF
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE RCRCGDPF ( ORIGIN string(10), E2ALNB INTEGER NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2ALNB', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2B9NB INTEGER NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2B9NB', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2ACDT INTEGER NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2ACDT', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2QGCH STRING(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2QGCH', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2KERC BIGDECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2KERC', NATIVE_TYPE 'BIGDECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2PESO BIGDECIMAL(8,3) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2PESO', NATIVE_TYPE 'BIGDECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2BAQT INTEGER NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2BAQT', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2A1TX string(25) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2A1TX', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2NIF string(17) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2NIF', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2AUTX string(70) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2AUTX', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2ENTX string(40) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2ENTX', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), E2DGAL string(15) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'E2DGAL', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), CONSTRAINT PK_RCRCGDPF PRIMARY KEY(E2ALNB) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'RCRCGDPF',UPDATABLE 'true')

model.name: MOD_RCRCSTPF
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE RCRCSTPF ( ORIGIN string(10), EQALNB INTEGER NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'EQALNB', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), EQB9NB INTEGER NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'EQB9NB', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), EQACDT INTEGER NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'EQACDT', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), EQKJNB INTEGER NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'EQKJNB', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), EQA6ST STRING(1) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'EQA6ST', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), EQASVN string(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'EQASVN', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), EQFRNB INTEGER NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'EQFRNB', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), CONSTRAINT PK_RCRCSTPF PRIMARY KEY(EQALNB) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'RCRCSTPF',UPDATABLE 'true')

model.name: MOD_RCPRORPF
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE RCPRORPF ( ORIGIN string(10), GJALNB INTEGER NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'GJALNB', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), GJB9NB INTEGER NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'GJB9NB', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), GJACDT INTEGER NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'GJACDT', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), GJA5NB string(9) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'GJA5NB', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), GJKGCD string(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'GJKGCD', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'FALSE'), CONSTRAINT PK_RCPRORPF PRIMARY KEY(GJALNB) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'RCPRORPF',UPDATABLE 'true')
